code: import moment from'moment';export default function selectTransactions(transactions,_ref){var searchText=_ref.searchText,sortBy=_ref.sortBy,startDate=_ref.startDate,endDate=_ref.endDate,accounts=_ref.accounts;return transactions.filter(function(transaction){var createdAtMoment=moment(transaction.createdAt);var startDateMatch=startDate?startDate.isSameOrBefore(createdAtMoment,"day"):true;var endDateMatch=endDate?endDate.isSameOrAfter(createdAtMoment,"day"):true;var textMatch=transaction.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchText.toLowerCase());var accountsMatch=accounts.includes(transaction.account);return startDateMatch&&endDateMatch&&textMatch&&accountsMatch;}).sort(function(a,b){if(sortBy==="date"){return a.createdAt<b.createdAt?1:-1;}else if(sortBy==="amount"){return a.amount<b.amount?1:-1;}return 0;});};
